Description: Thank you for visiting our ebay store! Features: 1.Silver Open Face 2 Sub-Dail 24-Hour Small Second Hand Roman Numerals Machanical Men Pocket Watch How to use/set mechanical pocket watch? A. Setting time Pull the crown away from base of the watch and turn the crown clockwise until reaching the exact time. B. Winding the watch Push the crown back into place along the base of the watch and winding up the watch clockwise rotation with 20-30 turns. The power will be full(Over winding will ultimately break the spring). Do this one time each day (before sleeping). Otherwise, it will stop working. Please do not over winding up the watch if you feel the crown is tight.
